metadata.title: CVE-2023-35827 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 6.3.8. A use-after-freewas found in ravb_remove in drivers/net/ethernet/renesas/ravb_main.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-35827` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-171-generic - 5.4.0-171.189
linux-image-5.4.0-171-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-171.189
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-171-generic - 5.4.0-171.189
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-171-lowlatency - 5.4.0-171.189
No subscription required

linux-image-5.15.0-94-generic - 5.15.0-94.104~20.04.1
linux-image-5.15.0-94-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-94.104~20.04.1
